explanation: There is only one way for all the girls to be on teh A team and only one way for all the girls to be on the B team. Therefore, there are two ways for the girls to be on the same team. 2 / nCr(10,5) = 1/126
instructions: A fair coin is flipped n times. Give an expression for each of the probabilities below as a function of n. Simplify your final expression as much as possible.
question:
(c)

The number of heads is different from the number of tails. (Assume that n is even, otherwise the probability is one.)
